mapper.select: SELECT * from (SELECT rownum rn ,a.* from (SELECT bc.*, nvl(cnt,0) creply_cnt,u.user_name FROM BOARD_COMM bc, (SELECT CBOARD_NO, count(*) cnt FROM BOARD_COMM_REPLY GROUP BY CBOARD_NO) bcr, users u WHERE bc.CBOARD_NO =bcr.CBOARD_NO(+) AND comm_big=300 AND comm_mid=10 AND bc.user_no = u.user_no order by cboard_date DESC) a) WHERE rn >= #{start} and rn <=#{end}
